title: ransomware component
extract: Automatic Exploit Protection (AEP) is a special component to stop malware (including ransomware) penetration through software vulnerabilities. ... Such an exploit can only be stopped on the network level. Kaspersky Lab's products have a special component for network traffic analysis – intrusion detection system (IDS).
extract_html: Automatic Exploit Protection (AEP) is a special component to stop malware (including ransomware) penetration through software vulnerabilities. ... Such an exploit can only be stopped on the network level. Kaspersky Lab's products have a special component for network traffic analysis – intrusion detection system (IDS).
